name: Somerlad's Adventure
description:
The game will tell you about the beginning of the story of Somerlad, currently working as a machinist in a small town, far from all the hardships of a big city.

Code: FotOGra7
Art: Greyviline

Controls:
A and D (or right and left arrows) - movement
Space - proceed dialogue

Made for #CozyAutumnGameJam2022 !
